export default with const:
const fn = (a: string | undefined): string => a;

export default fn;
export default directly: export default ((a: string | undefined): string => a);
export named: export const fn = (a: string | undefined): string => a;
function dts: export function a(n: number | undefined): number;
function parameter: export function fn(cb: (() => void) | undefined): void;
already parenthesized function parameter: export function fn(cb: (() => void) | undefined): void;
already includes undefined: export function fn(a: string | undefined): void;
